data.title: Brazil Foreign Exchange Rate: BCB: Offer: against Botswana Pula
data.meta_description: Brazil Foreign Exchange Rate: BCB: Offer: against Botswana Pula data was reported at 0.362 BRL/BWP in Jun 2019. This records a decrease from the previous number of 0.364 BRL/BWP for May 2019. Brazil Foreign Exchange Rate: BCB: Offer: against Botswana Pula data is updated monthly, averaging 0.341 BRL/BWP (Median) from Jul 1998 to Jun 2019, with 252 observations. The data reached an all-time high of 11.168 BRL/BWP in Feb 2001 and a record low of 0.235 BRL/BWP in Oct 2011. Brazil Foreign Exchange Rate: BCB: Offer: against Botswana Pula data remains active status in CEIC and is reported by Central Bank of Brazil. The data is categorized under Brazil Premium Database’s Interest and Foreign Exchange Rates – Table BR.MG002: Foreign Exchange Rate: Central Bank of Brazil.
data.text: This website stores cookies on your computer. These cookies are used to collect information about how you interact with our website and allow us to remember you. We use this information in order to improve and customize your browsing experience and for analytics and metrics about our visitors both on this website and other media. To find out more about the cookies we use, see our Cookies Policy.
